text: Hey team, looking to work with Emma Thompson for Pizza Hut. Budget is approx $2,329 - need 3 x Podcast guest, 3 x Product launch event, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x 5-minute review. 10 weeks exclusivity, 4 month engagement. Usage: 8 months. Start date: October 2025.
